name: Jimy's Adventure
description:
A prototype of an adventure game, 

the focus is to make you survive every difficulty and tension the game shows beat the bosses and challenges and reach your final goal but alweys a surprise

directed by: João Vitor (OmeleteFrito) and Felipe Rahmeh

Arts by: Gabriel and João Vitor (OmeleteFrito)

Engine: Game Maker Studio 2

Studio: Omelet Development Team

This game is a prototype, many things can change! we count on you to improve the development and continue until its release

Thanks You! Omelet Development Team.
